item.title: Video Maker for Website Interview Style Video - San Jose CA - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video maker to create a 2-3 minute video for my website. The video will be interview style, where you will record, edit, and produce the final product. I will provide a Q&A style script and guidance on the content, but I need someone who can bring their creative touch and make the video engaging and professional. The main focus will be on showcasing my services and expertise as a ghostwriter. (See sallycollings dot com)
As well as the 2-3 minute video, I'd like the video maker to create some spinoff pieces (video or still) I can use for social media.
Must be filmed in-person - I'm based in San Jose.

  Skills required:
  - Videography and video editing
  - Interviewing skills
  - Storytelling through video
  - Knowledge of video production techniques
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

I'm a solopreneur, so I'm looking for someone who can work closely with me and understand my vision. This is a great opportunity to showcase your video-making skills and collaborate with a high-level ghostwriter and book expert.

  Size: Small
  Duration: Under 1 month
  Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editing & Sound Quality Enhancement - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to edit, make smooth transitions and remove audible background noise from a video. The video is an interview in three separate clips and will need to follow provided time stamps.  The time stamps ensure the proper flow of content.  The interview needs to flow from this in addition to enhancing and improve the overall sound quality. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and sound design, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to deliver high-quality output. Key skills required for this job include:

- Video editing
- Sound design
- Audio editing
- Smooth video transitions
- Noise reduction
- Audio enhancement
- Attention to detail

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Post Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Post Production
Country: United States

item.title: Travel YouTube Channel Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Editor to join our travel YouTube channel. As the Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our travel videos to create visually appealing and engaging content for our viewers. Your main duties will include trimming footage, adding transitions and effects, adjusting color and audio, and ensuring a smooth flow of the final video. The ideal candidate should have a good understanding of travel content and be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial skills for this role.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production

item.title: Arabic content creators wanted for short language videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for energetic Arabic speaking actors with personality, who can film and edit their own content. The videos will be very simple and used to help people who want to learn Arabic.

Please Only Apply If you
- You Speak Arabic
- You can film and edit your own videos in HD quality.

Job Details
PART 1 - 25 short 3 second videos - Standing while saying phrases directly to camera.
PART 2 - 8 scripted 30 second videos - Acting out a short scenario while speaking Hebrew.

See examples for each type of video attached below
Filming guidelines will be provided to help you record the videos in the best way.










Budget: $130

item.title: Editing some text on screen for indigenous documentary - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I have stalled on finishing my doco clip passion project from an event i attended. I would like someone to over see the text in my video and give pointers in a couple where editing may be needed. Specifically I am stuck on the outro of the film where i should wrap it up with calling in for help to support this family who are fighting for their ancestral land. This wordign is not my strogn point in text and would deeply appreciate some help in getting this message out. The text is only 50- 150 words.
Budget is open to suitable match.
Kind regards.

Budget: $40

item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a video maker to create a brief tutorial video demonstrating how to use a streetwear mockups package. I have attached a sample video to give an idea of the format and style I am looking for.

Project Details:

- Video Length: Approximately 0.30-1.30 minutes max
- Content: The video should illustrate the main steps for using the mockups, highlighting the features and functionalities of the package.

What I Offer:

Opportunity for ongoing collaboration on similar future projects.

If you are interested, please send me your portfolio and a brief description of your experience. I am available for further details and clarifications.

Thank you!

item.title: Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to complete a project for us. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage to create high-quality videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing software and techniques. Attention to detail is essential for this role.

We have an existing video that we want to edit to add new content and remove some of the existing content.  We have gone through the entire original video and noted the time stamps for each section.  We have indicated the specific timestamps for which content needs to be removed and added links to the raw video for the new content.  We want new labels added and some of the labels changes, and we would like the new labels to match the existing labels.  Here is the document with the detail: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LwSODIyQDxDMjFFZhASMxR4XpTTBv9zr/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=100676113714944694806&rtpof=true&sd=true

And here is a link to the folder with all of the content:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yHfxjVVAX72b0MV0gQfYvfq3dsjSEgVr?usp=drive_link

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Knowledge of video formats and codecs
- Ability to apply color correction and visual effects
- Excellent time management and organizational skills

This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of less than a week (10 to 15 hours).

Expertise Level: Intermediate


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 24, 2024 17:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
